वे बहुत सारे लेखक किसी भी अनुशासन के जिन: Ve bahut saare lekhak kisi bhi anushasan ke jinhone kabhi koi patrika nahi nikali, na prayatn kiye, lekin bahut saari patrikaon mein prakashit hote rahe hain, unmein bhi, jinhein ve accha nahi maante, unhein kam se kam, ek baar, ek patrika nikaalne ki, genuine koshish karni chahiye.
हम यह बात यद्यपि मूलतः साहित्य, कला आदि: Ham yeh baat yadyapi moolatah sahity, kala aadi ki, aur unme bhi, gair sansthaayik kism ki patrikaon ke sandarbh mein keh rahe hain, lekin, anya anushasanon mein bhi, rachnatmak prayatn apni shuruaat mein, lagbhag ek jaisi vaigyanik nishchitata, aur beema companies jaisi, bhavishya drishti ke saath, avtarit hote hain.
